short_summary: Items: Fluid filter. Next delivery to 7CFSD Edmonton. In Nov 2023.
full_summary:
## Filter Fluids Tender Announcement
### Solicitation Number
W8485-247845/A

### Publication Date and Tender Closing Date
The tender notice was published on October 12, 2023, and the bidding window closes on November 15, 2023 at 14:00:00.

### Contract Notice Details
The Department of National Defence has a procurement requirement for filter fluids. Bidders are encouraged to submit electronic bids using the epost Connect service to mitigate the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic.

### Items Required
Two items have been identified for procurement:

#### Item 1: Fluid Filter
* GSIN: 2910
* NSN: 2910-01-242-5196
* Part No.: 50C-0010-2
* Quantity: 25 units
* Unit of Issue: Each
* Required delivery date: November 2023 to 7 CFSD Edmonton

#### Item 2: Fluid Filter
* GSIN: 2940
* NSN: 2940-00-244-3610
* Part No.: 113033FRU
* Quantity: 25 units
* Unit of Issue: Each
* Required delivery date: November 2023 to 7 CFSD Edmonton

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contracting Entities and End-User Entities
* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
* End-User Entity: Not applicable

### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Debbie Bergeron
* Contact Email: debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca

### Notice URL
Not available

### Bid Solicitation Documents
The bid solicitation documents can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21933/w8485-247845---bid-solicitation-en-canada-buys.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21933/w8485-247845---bid-solicitation-fr-achats-canada.pdf

Note to bidders: Bidders are requested to indicate the brand name, model, and/or Part Number, and the NCAGE code for any equivalent or substitute products proposed. The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be
